MainPage.title: Mediagram Vouchers
MainPage.content: MGM Vouchers are created to develop Mediagram's unique advertising ecosystem, offering innovative solutions and technologies to the advertising market.

FAQ1.title: Long-term growth potential
FAQ1.content: Long-term growth potential: As the Mediagram platform develops, the value of MGM tokens and advertising spaces will increase, providing significant benefits to early investors.

FAQ2.title: A unique opportunity to be one of the first
FAQ2.content: A unique opportunity to be one of the first renters of advertising spaces and gain exclusive access to Mediagram's premium services.

FAQ3.title: Possibility of early participation
FAQ3.content: The chance for early participation in earning rewards, profits from liquidity and staking, as well as access to airdrops.

VoucherPage.title: MGM Vouchers
VoucherPage.input1: Enter the number of MGM tokens in multiples 10

FAQForm.title: How to purchase vouchers?
FAQForm.step1: Enter the number of vouchers in multiples of 10.
FAQForm.step2: Wait for the cost to be calculated and click "Buy".
FAQForm.step3: Transfer the required amount of USDT (TON) to the provided address.
FAQForm.step4: Wait for the voucher to arrive at the address from which the payment was made.

PayPage.title: MGM Vouchers
PayPage.content: Don't miss your chance to be part of the future of digital advertising with Mediagram!

warning.title: Attention!
warning.content: Transfer only USDT tokens of the TON (The Open Network) network to this address, otherwise you will permanently lose your funds.

StatusPage.title: Payment was successful
StatusPage.content: Wait for the voucher to arrive at the address from which the payment was made.
